entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:48 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with freezing rain this evening and after midnight and with periods of freezing drizzle overnight. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle. Drizzle or periods of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
